message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500.  I think you'll find this price very competitive given its value.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $8,800 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,200 for the product.  Would that be agreeable to you?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $9,000 for the product.
